article.title: Praemittias to Train Deploying Warfighters on Electronic Warfare Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Praemittias Group Incorporated, Lorton, Virginia, is being awarded an $11,447,070 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 100 Wolfhound electronic warfare systems. These systems will be used at Marine Corps bases for hands-on training prior to user deployment into the theater of operation. The Marine Corps System Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
